aya_text_emlaey: وما هم عنها بغائبين
Saheeh International Translation: And never therefrom will they be absent.

Ayah Text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا يَوۡمُ ٱلدِّينِ ١٧
aya_text_emlaey: وما أدراك ما يوم الدين
Saheeh International Translation: And what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?

Ayah Text: ثُمَّ مَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا يَوۡمُ ٱلدِّينِ ١٨
aya_text_emlaey: ثم ما أدراك ما يوم الدين
Saheeh International Translation: Then, what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?

Ayah Text: يَوۡمَ لَا تَمۡلِكُ نَفۡسٞ لِّنَفۡسٖ شَيۡـٔٗاۖ وَٱلۡأَمۡرُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلَّهِ ١٩
aya_text_emlaey: يوم لا تملك نفس لنفس شيئا والأمر يومئذ لله
Saheeh International Translation: It is the Day when a soul will not possess for another soul [power to do] a thing; and the command, that Day, is [entirely] with Allah.

Ayah Text: وَيۡلٞ لِّلۡمُطَفِّفِينَ ١
aya_text_emlaey: ويل للمطففين
Saheeh International Translation: Woe to those who give less [than due],

Ayah Text: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكۡتَالُواْ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسۡتَوۡفُونَ ٢
aya_text_emlaey: الذين إذا اكتالوا على الناس يستوفون
Saheeh International Translation: Who, when they take a measure from people, take in full.

Ayah Text: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمۡ أَو وَّزَنُوهُمۡ يُخۡسِرُونَ ٣
aya_text_emlaey: وإذا كالوهم أو وزنوهم يخسرون
Saheeh International Translation: But if they give by measure or by weight to them, they cause loss.

Ayah Text: أَلَا يَظُنُّ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَنَّهُم مَّبۡعُوثُونَ ٤
aya_text_emlaey: ألا يظن أولئك أنهم مبعوثون
Saheeh International Translation: Do they not think that they will be resurrected

Ayah Text: لِيَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ ٥
aya_text_emlaey: ليوم عظيم
Saheeh International Translation: For a tremendous Day -

Ayah Text: يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلنَّاسُ لِرَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ ٦
aya_text_emlaey: يوم يقوم الناس لرب العالمين
Saheeh International Translation: The Day when mankind will stand before the Lord of the worlds?

Ayah Text: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٖ ٧
aya_text_emlaey: كلا إن كتاب الفجار لفي سجين
Saheeh International Translation: No! Indeed, the record of the wicked is in sijjeen.

Ayah Text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا سِجِّينٞ ٨
aya_text_emlaey: وما أدراك ما سجين
Saheeh International Translation: And what can make you know what is sijjeen?

Ayah Text: كِتَٰبٞ مَّرۡقُومٞ ٩
aya_text_emlaey: كتاب مرقوم
Saheeh International Translation: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed.

Ayah Text: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ ١٠
aya_text_emlaey: ويل يومئذ للمكذبين
Saheeh International Translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers,

Ayah Text: ٱلَّذِينَ يُكَذِّبُونَ بِيَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ ١١
aya_text_emlaey: الذين يكذبون بيوم الدين
Saheeh International Translation: Who deny the Day of Recompense.

Ayah Text: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعۡتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ ١٢
aya_text_emlaey: وما يكذب به إلا كل معتد أثيم
Saheeh International Translation: And none deny it except every sinful transgressor.

Ayah Text: إِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ ١٣
aya_text_emlaey: إذا تتلى عليه آياتنا قال أساطير الأولين
Saheeh International Translation: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples."

Ayah Text: كَلَّاۖ بَلۡۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ ١٤
aya_text_emlaey: كلا بل ران على قلوبهم ما كانوا يكسبون
Saheeh International Translation: No! Rather, the stain has covered their hearts of that which they were earning.

Ayah Text: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمۡ عَن رَّبِّهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّمَحۡجُوبُونَ ١٥
aya_text_emlaey: كلا إنهم عن ربهم يومئذ لمحجوبون
Saheeh International Translation: No! Indeed, from their Lord, that Day, they will be partitioned.

Ayah Text: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمۡ لَصَالُواْ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ ١٦
aya_text_emlaey: ثم إنهم لصالوا الجحيم
Saheeh International Translation: Then indeed, they will [enter and] burn in Hellfire.

Ayah Text: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ ١٧
aya_text_emlaey: ثم يقال هذا الذي كنتم به تكذبون
Saheeh International Translation: Then it will be said [to them], "This is what you used to deny."

Ayah Text: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ ١٨
aya_text_emlaey: كلا إن كتاب الأبرار لفي عليين
Saheeh International Translation: No! Indeed, the record of the righteous is in 'illiyyun.

Ayah Text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا عِلِّيُّونَ ١٩
aya_text_emlaey: وما أدراك ما عليون
Saheeh International Translation: And what can make you know what is 'illiyyun?

Ayah Text: كِتَٰبٞ مَّرۡقُومٞ ٢٠
aya_text_emlaey: كتاب مرقوم
Saheeh International Translation: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed

Ayah Text: يَشۡهَدُهُ ٱلۡمُقَرَّبُونَ ٢١
aya_text_emlaey: يشهده المقربون
Saheeh International Translation: Which is witnessed by those brought near [to Allah].

Ayah Text: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٍ ٢٢
aya_text_emlaey: إن الأبرار لفي نعيم
Saheeh International Translation: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure

Ayah Text: عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ ٢٣
aya_text_emlaey: على الأرائك ينظرون
Saheeh International Translation: On adorned couches, observing.

Ayah Text: تَعۡرِفُ فِي وُجُوهِهِمۡ نَضۡرَةَ ٱلنَّعِيمِ ٢٤
aya_text_emlaey: تعرف في وجوههم نضرة النعيم
Saheeh International Translation: You will recognize in their faces the radiance of pleasure.

Ayah Text: يُسۡقَوۡنَ مِن رَّحِيقٖ مَّخۡتُومٍ ٢٥
aya_text_emlaey: يسقون من رحيق مختوم
Saheeh International Translation: They will be given to drink [pure] wine [which was] sealed.

Ayah Text: خِتَٰمُهُۥ مِسۡكٞۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكَ فَلۡيَتَنَافَسِ ٱلۡمُتَنَٰفِسُونَ ٢٦
aya_text_emlaey: ختامه مسك وفي ذلك فليتنافس المتنافسون
Saheeh International Translation: The last of it is musk. So for this let the competitors compete.

Ayah Text: وَمِزَاجُهُۥ مِن تَسۡنِيمٍ ٢٧
aya_text_emlaey: ومزاجه من تسنيم
Saheeh International Translation: And its mixture is of Tasneem,

Ayah Text: عَيۡنٗا يَشۡرَبُ بِهَا ٱلۡمُقَرَّبُونَ ٢٨
aya_text_emlaey: عينا يشرب بها المقربون
Saheeh International Translation: A spring from which those near [to Allah] drink.

Ayah Text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجۡرَمُواْ كَانُواْ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ يَضۡحَكُونَ ٢٩
aya_text_emlaey: إن الذين أجرموا كانوا من الذين آمنوا يضحكون
Saheeh International Translation: Indeed, those who committed crimes used to laugh at those who believed.

Ayah Text: وَإِذَا مَرُّواْ بِهِمۡ يَتَغَامَزُونَ ٣٠
aya_text_emlaey: وإذا مروا بهم يتغامزون
Saheeh International Translation: And when they passed by them, they would exchange derisive glances.

Ayah Text: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُواْ فَكِهِينَ ٣١
aya_text_emlaey: وإذا انقلبوا إلى أهلهم انقلبوا فكهين
Saheeh International Translation: And when they returned to their people, they would return jesting.

Ayah Text: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡهُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ ٣٢
aya_text_emlaey: وإذا رأوهم قالوا إن هؤلاء لضالون
Saheeh International Translation: And when they saw them, they would say, "Indeed, those are truly lost."

Ayah Text: وَمَآ أُرۡسِلُواْ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَٰفِظِينَ ٣٣
aya_text_emlaey: وما أرسلوا عليهم حافظين
Saheeh International Translation: But they had not been sent as guardians over them.

Ayah Text: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ يَضۡحَكُونَ ٣٤
aya_text_emlaey: فاليوم الذين آمنوا من الكفار يضحكون
Saheeh International Translation: So Today those who believed are laughing at the disbelievers,

Ayah Text: عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ ٣٥
aya_text_emlaey: على الأرائك ينظرون
Saheeh International Translation: On adorned couches, observing.

Ayah Text: هَلۡ ثُوِّبَ ٱلۡكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُواْ يَفۡعَلُونَ ٣٦
aya_text_emlaey: هل ثوب الكفار ما كانوا يفعلون
Saheeh International Translation: Have the disbelievers [not] been rewarded [this Day] for what they used to do?

Ayah Text: إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنشَقَّتۡ ١
aya_text_emlaey: إذا السماء انشقت
Saheeh International Translation: When the sky has split [open]

Ayah Text: وَأَذِنَتۡ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتۡ ٢
aya_text_emlaey: وأذنت لربها وحقت
Saheeh International Translation: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so]

Ayah Text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡأَرۡضُ مُدَّتۡ ٣
aya_text_emlaey: وإذا الأرض مدت
Saheeh International Translation: And when the earth has been extended

Ayah Text: وَأَلۡقَتۡ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتۡ ٤
aya_text_emlaey: وألقت ما فيها وتخلت
Saheeh International Translation: And has cast out that within it and relinquished [it]

Ayah Text: وَأَذِنَتۡ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتۡ ٥
aya_text_emlaey: وأذنت لربها وحقت
Saheeh International Translation: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so] -

Ayah Text: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدۡحٗا فَمُلَٰقِيهِ ٦
aya_text_emlaey: ياأيها الإنسان إنك كادح إلى ربك كدحا فملاقيه
Saheeh International Translation: O mankind, indeed you are laboring toward your Lord with [great] exertion and will meet it.

Ayah Text: فَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ ٧
aya_text_emlaey: فأما من أوتي كتابه بيمينه
Saheeh International Translation: Then as for he who is given his record in his right hand,

Ayah Text: فَسَوۡفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابٗا يَسِيرٗا ٨
aya_text_emlaey: فسوف يحاسب حسابا يسيرا
Saheeh International Translation: He will be judged with an easy account

Ayah Text: وَيَنقَلِبُ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ مَسۡرُورٗا ٩
aya_text_emlaey: وينقلب إلى أهله مسرورا
Saheeh International Translation: And return to his people in happiness.

Ayah Text: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهۡرِهِۦ ١٠
aya_text_emlaey: وأما من أوتي كتابه وراء ظهره
Saheeh International Translation: But as for he who is given his record behind his back,

Ayah Text: فَسَوۡفَ يَدۡعُواْ ثُبُورٗا ١١
aya_text_emlaey: فسوف يدعو ثبورا
Saheeh International Translation: He will cry out for destruction

Ayah Text: وَيَصۡلَىٰ سَعِيرًا ١٢
aya_text_emlaey: ويصلى سعيرا
Saheeh International Translation: And [enter to] burn in a Blaze.

Ayah Text: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فِيٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ مَسۡرُورًا ١٣
aya_text_emlaey: إنه كان في أهله مسرورا
Saheeh International Translation: Indeed, he had [once] been among his people in happiness;

Ayah Text: إِنَّهُۥ ظَنَّ أَن لَّن يَحُورَ ١٤
aya_text_emlaey: إنه ظن أن لن يحور
Saheeh International Translation: Indeed, he had thought he would never return [to Allah].

Ayah Text: بَلَىٰٓۚ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرٗا ١٥
aya_text_emlaey: بلى إن ربه كان به بصيرا
Saheeh International Translation: But yes! Indeed, his Lord was ever of him, Seeing.

Ayah Text: فَلَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِٱلشَّفَقِ ١٦
aya_text_emlaey: فلا أقسم بالشفق
Saheeh International Translation: So I swear by the twilight glow

Ayah Text: وَٱلَّيۡلِ وَمَا وَسَقَ ١٧
aya_text_emlaey: والليل وما وسق
Saheeh International Translation: And [by] the night and what it envelops

Ayah Text: وَٱلۡقَمَرِ إِذَا ٱتَّسَقَ ١٨
aya_text_emlaey: والقمر إذا اتسق
Saheeh International Translation: And [by] the moon when it becomes full

Ayah Text: لَتَرۡكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَن طَبَقٖ ١٩
aya_text_emlaey: لتركبن طبقا عن طبق
Saheeh International Translation: [That] you will surely experience state after state.

Ayah Text: فَمَا لَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ ٢٠
aya_text_emlaey: فما لهم لا يؤمنون
Saheeh International Translation: So what is [the matter] with them [that] they do not believe,

Ayah Text: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ لَا يَسۡجُدُونَۤ۩ ٢١
aya_text_emlaey: وإذا قرئ عليهم القرآن لا يسجدون
Saheeh International Translation: And when the Qur'an is recited to them, they do not prostrate [to Allah]?

Ayah Text: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ يُكَذِّبُونَ ٢٢
aya_text_emlaey: بل الذين كفروا يكذبون
Saheeh International Translation: But those who have disbelieved deny,

Ayah Text: وَٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يُوعُونَ ٢٣
aya_text_emlaey: والله أعلم بما يوعون
Saheeh International Translation: And Allah is most knowing of what they keep within themselves.

Ayah Text: فَبَشِّرۡهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ ٢٤
aya_text_emlaey: فبشرهم بعذاب أليم
Saheeh International Translation: So give them tidings of a painful punishment,

Ayah Text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونِۭ ٢٥
aya_text_emlaey: إلا الذين آمنوا وعملوا الصالحات لهم أجر غير ممنون
Saheeh International Translation: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds. For them is a reward uninterrupted.

Ayah Text: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلۡبُرُوجِ ١
aya_text_emlaey: والسماء ذات البروج
Saheeh International Translation: By the sky containing great stars

Ayah Text: وَٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡمَوۡعُودِ ٢
aya_text_emlaey: واليوم الموعود
Saheeh International Translation: And [by] the promised Day

Ayah Text: وَشَاهِدٖ وَمَشۡهُودٖ ٣
aya_text_emlaey: وشاهد ومشهود
Saheeh International Translation: And [by] the witness and what is witnessed,

Ayah Text: قُتِلَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡأُخۡدُودِ ٤
aya_text_emlaey: قتل أصحاب الأخدود
Saheeh International Translation: Cursed were the companions of the trench

Ayah Text: ٱلنَّارِ ذَاتِ ٱلۡوَقُودِ ٥
aya_text_emlaey: النار ذات الوقود
Saheeh International Translation: [Containing] the fire full of fuel,

Ayah Text: إِذۡ هُمۡ عَلَيۡهَا قُعُودٞ ٦
aya_text_emlaey: إذ هم عليها قعود
Saheeh International Translation: When they were sitting near it

Ayah Text: وَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَلُونَ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ شُهُودٞ ٧
aya_text_emlaey: وهم على ما يفعلون بالمؤمنين شهود
Saheeh International Translation: And they, to what they were doing against the believers, were witnesses.

Ayah Text: وَمَا نَقَمُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤۡمِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ ٨
aya_text_emlaey: وما نقموا منهم إلا أن يؤمنوا بالله العزيز الحميد
Saheeh International Translation: And they resented them not except because they believed in Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy,

Ayah Text: ٱلَّذِي لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ شَهِيدٌ ٩
aya_text_emlaey: الذي له ملك السموات والأرض والله على كل شيء شهيد
Saheeh International Translation: To whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. And Allah, over all things, is Witness.

Ayah Text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَتَنُواْ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمۡ يَتُوبُواْ فَلَهُمۡ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابُ ٱلۡحَرِيقِ ١٠
aya_text_emlaey: إن الذين فتنوا المؤمنين والمؤمنات ثم لم يتوبوا فلهم عذاب جهنم ولهم عذاب الحريق
Saheeh International Translation: Indeed, those who have tortured the believing men and believing women and then have not repented will have the punishment of Hell, and they will have the punishment of the Burning Fire.

Ayah Text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتٞ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡكَبِيرُ ١١
aya_text_emlaey: إن الذين آمنوا وعملوا الصالحات لهم جنات تجري من تحتها الأنهار ذلك الفوز الكبير
Saheeh International Translation: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds will have gardens beneath which rivers flow. That is the great attainment.

Ayah Text: إِنَّ بَطۡشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيدٌ ١٢
aya_text_emlaey: إن بطش ربك لشديد
Saheeh International Translation: Indeed, the vengeance of your Lord is severe.

Ayah Text: إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ يُبۡدِئُ وَيُعِيدُ ١٣
aya_text_emlaey: إنه هو يبدئ ويعيد
Saheeh International Translation: Indeed, it is He who originates [creation] and repeats.

Ayah Text: وَهُوَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلۡوَدُودُ ١٤
aya_text_emlaey: وهو الغفور الودود
Saheeh International Translation: And He is the Forgiving, the Affectionate,

Ayah Text: ذُو ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡمَجِيدُ ١٥
aya_text_emlaey: ذو العرش المجيد
Saheeh International Translation: Honorable Owner of the Throne,

Ayah Text: فَعَّالٞ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ ١٦
aya_text_emlaey: فعال لما يريد
Saheeh International Translation: Effecter of what He intends.

Ayah Text: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلۡجُنُودِ ١٧
aya_text_emlaey: هل أتاك حديث الجنود
Saheeh International Translation: Has there reached you the story of the soldiers -

Ayah Text: فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَثَمُودَ ١٨
aya_text_emlaey: فرعون وثمود
Saheeh International Translation: [Those of] Pharaoh and Thamud?

Ayah Text: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي تَكۡذِيبٖ ١٩
aya_text_emlaey: بل الذين كفروا في تكذيب
Saheeh International Translation: But they who disbelieve are in [persistent] denial,

Ayah Text: وَٱللَّهُ مِن وَرَآئِهِم مُّحِيطُۢ ٢٠
aya_text_emlaey: والله من ورائهم محيط
Saheeh International Translation: While Allah encompasses them from behind.

Ayah Text: بَلۡ هُوَ قُرۡءَانٞ مَّجِيدٞ ٢١
aya_text_emlaey: بل هو قرآن مجيد
Saheeh International Translation: But this is an honored Qur'an

Ayah Text: فِي لَوۡحٖ مَّحۡفُوظِۭ ٢٢
aya_text_emlaey: في لوح محفوظ
Saheeh International Translation: [Inscribed] in a Preserved Slate.

Ayah Text: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلطَّارِقِ ١
aya_text_emlaey: والسماء والطارق
Saheeh International Translation: By the sky and the night comer -

Ayah Text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلطَّارِقُ ٢
aya_text_emlaey: وما أدراك ما الطارق
Saheeh International Translation: And what can make you know what is the night comer?

Ayah Text: ٱلنَّجۡمُ ٱلثَّاقِبُ ٣
aya_text_emlaey: النجم الثاقب
Saheeh International Translation: It is the piercing star -

Ayah Text: إِن كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ لَّمَّا عَلَيۡهَا حَافِظٞ ٤
aya_text_emlaey: إن كل نفس لما عليها حافظ
Saheeh International Translation: There is no soul but that it has over it a protector.

Ayah Text: فَلۡيَنظُرِ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ ٥
aya_text_emlaey: فلينظر الإنسان مم خلق
Saheeh International Translation: So let man observe from what he was created.

Ayah Text: خُلِقَ مِن مَّآءٖ دَافِقٖ ٦
aya_text_emlaey: خلق من ماء دافق
Saheeh International Translation: He was created from a fluid, ejected,

Ayah Text: يَخۡرُجُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِ ٱلصُّلۡبِ وَٱلتَّرَآئِبِ ٧
aya_text_emlaey: يخرج من بين الصلب والترائب
Saheeh International Translation: Emerging from between the backbone and the ribs.

Ayah Text: إِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَجۡعِهِۦ لَقَادِرٞ ٨
aya_text_emlaey: إنه على رجعه لقادر
Saheeh International Translation: Indeed, Allah, to return him [to life], is Able.

Ayah Text: يَوۡمَ تُبۡلَى ٱلسَّرَآئِرُ ٩
aya_text_emlaey: يوم تبلى السرائر
Saheeh International Translation: The Day when secrets will be put on trial,

Ayah Text: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن قُوَّةٖ وَلَا نَاصِرٖ ١٠
aya_text_emlaey: فما له من قوة ولا ناصر
Saheeh International Translation: Then man will have no power or any helper.

Ayah Text: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلرَّجۡعِ ١١
aya_text_emlaey: والسماء ذات الرجع
Saheeh International Translation: By the sky which returns [rain]

Ayah Text: وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ ذَاتِ ٱلصَّدۡعِ ١٢
aya_text_emlaey: والأرض ذات الصدع
Saheeh International Translation: And [by] the earth which cracks open,

Ayah Text: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوۡلٞ فَصۡلٞ ١٣
aya_text_emlaey: إنه لقول فصل
Saheeh International Translation: Indeed, the Qur'an is a decisive statement,

Ayah Text: وَمَا هُوَ بِٱلۡهَزۡلِ ١٤
aya_text_emlaey: وما هو بالهزل
Saheeh International Translation: And it is not amusement.

Ayah Text: إِنَّهُمۡ يَكِيدُونَ كَيۡدٗا ١٥
aya_text_emlaey: إنهم يكيدون كيدا
Saheeh International Translation: Indeed, they are planning a plan,

Ayah Text: وَأَكِيدُ كَيۡدٗا ١٦
aya_text_emlaey: وأكيد كيدا
Saheeh International Translation: But I am planning a plan.

Ayah Text: فَمَهِّلِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ أَمۡهِلۡهُمۡ رُوَيۡدَۢا ١٧
aya_text_emlaey: فمهل الكافرين أمهلهم رويدا
Saheeh International Translation: So allow time for the disbelievers. Leave them awhile.

Ayah Text: سَبِّحِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ ٱلۡأَعۡلَى ١
aya_text_emlaey: سبح اسم ربك الأعلى
Saheeh International Translation: Exalt the name of your Lord, the Most High,

Ayah Text: ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ ٢
aya_text_emlaey: الذي خلق فسوى
Saheeh International Translation: Who created and proportioned

Ayah Text: وَٱلَّذِي قَدَّرَ فَهَدَىٰ ٣
aya_text_emlaey: والذي قدر فهدى
Saheeh International Translation: And who destined and [then] guided

Ayah Text: وَٱلَّذِيٓ أَخۡرَجَ ٱلۡمَرۡعَىٰ ٤
aya_text_emlaey: والذي أخرج المرعى
Saheeh International Translation: And who brings out the pasture

Ayah Text: فَجَعَلَهُۥ غُثَآءً أَحۡوَىٰ ٥
aya_text_emlaey: فجعله غثاء أحوى
Saheeh International Translation: And [then] makes it black stubble.

Ayah Text: سَنُقۡرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنسَىٰٓ ٦
aya_text_emlaey: سنقرئك فلا تنسى
Saheeh International Translation: We will make you recite, [O Muhammad], and you will not forget,

Ayah Text: إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡجَهۡرَ وَمَا يَخۡفَىٰ ٧
aya_text_emlaey: إلا ما شاء الله إنه يعلم الجهر وما يخفى
Saheeh International Translation: Except what Allah should will. Indeed, He knows what is declared and what is hidden.

Ayah Text: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ لِلۡيُسۡرَىٰ ٨
aya_text_emlaey: ونيسرك لليسرى
Saheeh International Translation: And We will ease you toward ease.

Ayah Text: فَذَكِّرۡ إِن نَّفَعَتِ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ ٩
aya_text_emlaey: فذكر إن نفعت الذكرى
Saheeh International Translation: So remind, if the reminder should benefit;

Ayah Text: سَيَذَّكَّرُ مَن يَخۡشَىٰ ١٠
aya_text_emlaey: سيذكر من يخشى
Saheeh International Translation: He who fears [Allah] will be reminded.

Ayah Text: وَيَتَجَنَّبُهَا ٱلۡأَشۡقَى ١١
aya_text_emlaey: ويتجنبها الأشقى
Saheeh International Translation: But the wretched one will avoid it -

Ayah Text: ٱلَّذِي يَصۡلَى ٱلنَّارَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰ ١٢
aya_text_emlaey: الذي يصلى النار الكبرى
Saheeh International Translation: [He] who will [enter and] burn in the greatest Fire,

Ayah Text: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحۡيَىٰ ١٣
aya_text_emlaey: ثم لا يموت فيها ولا يحيا
Saheeh International Translation: Neither dying therein nor living.

Ayah Text: قَدۡ أَفۡلَحَ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ ١٤
aya_text_emlaey: قد أفلح من تزكى
Saheeh International Translation: He has certainly succeeded who purifies himself

Ayah Text: وَذَكَرَ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّهِۦ فَصَلَّىٰ ١٥
aya_text_emlaey: وذكر اسم ربه فصلى
Saheeh International Translation: And mentions the name of his Lord and prays.

Ayah Text: بَلۡ تُؤۡثِرُونَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا ١٦
aya_text_emlaey: بل تؤثرون الحياة الدنيا
Saheeh International Translation: But you prefer the worldly life,

Ayah Text: وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةُ خَيۡرٞ وَأَبۡقَىٰٓ ١٧
aya_text_emlaey: والآخرة خير وأبقى
Saheeh International Translation: While the Hereafter is better and more enduring.

Ayah Text: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَفِي ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ ١٨
aya_text_emlaey: إن هذا لفي الصحف الأولى
Saheeh International Translation: Indeed, this is in the former scriptures,

Ayah Text: صُحُفِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ ١٩
aya_text_emlaey: صحف إبراهيم وموسى
Saheeh International Translation: The scriptures of Abraham and Moses.

Ayah Text: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلۡغَٰشِيَةِ ١
aya_text_emlaey: هل أتاك حديث الغاشية
Saheeh International Translation: Has there reached you the report of the Overwhelming [event]?

Ayah Text: وُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذٍ خَٰشِعَةٌ ٢
aya_text_emlaey: وجوه يومئذ خاشعة
Saheeh International Translation: [Some] faces, that Day, will be humbled,

Ayah Text: عَامِلَةٞ نَّاصِبَةٞ ٣
aya_text_emlaey: عاملة ناصبة
Saheeh International Translation: Working [hard] and exhausted.

Ayah Text: تَصۡلَىٰ نَارًا حَامِيَةٗ ٤
aya_text_emlaey: تصلى نارا حامية
Saheeh International Translation: They will [enter to] burn in an intensely hot Fire.

Ayah Text: تُسۡقَىٰ مِنۡ عَيۡنٍ ءَانِيَةٖ ٥
aya_text_emlaey: تسقى من عين آنية
Saheeh International Translation: They will be given drink from a boiling spring.

Ayah Text: لَّيۡسَ لَهُمۡ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٖ ٦
aya_text_emlaey: ليس لهم طعام إلا من ضريع
Saheeh International Translation: For them there will be no food except from a poisonous, thorny plant

Ayah Text: لَّا يُسۡمِنُ وَلَا يُغۡنِي مِن جُوعٖ ٧
aya_text_emlaey: لا يسمن ولا يغني من جوع
Saheeh International Translation: Which neither nourishes nor avails against hunger.

Ayah Text: وُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ نَّاعِمَةٞ ٨
aya_text_emlaey: وجوه يومئذ ناعمة
Saheeh International Translation: [Other] faces, that Day, will show pleasure.

Ayah Text: لِّسَعۡيِهَا رَاضِيَةٞ ٩
aya_text_emlaey: لسعيها راضية
Saheeh International Translation: With their effort [they are] satisfied

Ayah Text: فِي جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٖ ١٠
aya_text_emlaey: في جنة عالية
Saheeh International Translation: In an elevated garden,

Ayah Text: لَّا تَسۡمَعُ فِيهَا لَٰغِيَةٗ ١١
aya_text_emlaey: لا تسمع فيها لاغية
Saheeh International Translation: Wherein they will hear no unsuitable speech.

Ayah Text: فِيهَا عَيۡنٞ جَارِيَةٞ ١٢
aya_text_emlaey: فيها عين جارية
Saheeh International Translation: Within it is a flowing spring.

Ayah Text: فِيهَا سُرُرٞ مَّرۡفُوعَةٞ ١٣
aya_text_emlaey: فيها سرر مرفوعة
Saheeh International Translation: Within it are couches raised high

Ayah Text: وَأَكۡوَابٞ مَّوۡضُوعَةٞ ١٤
aya_text_emlaey: وأكواب موضوعة
Saheeh International Translation: And cups put in place

Ayah Text: وَنَمَارِقُ مَصۡفُوفَةٞ ١٥
aya_text_emlaey: ونمارق مصفوفة
Saheeh International Translation: And cushions lined up

Ayah Text: وَزَرَابِيُّ مَبۡثُوثَةٌ ١٦
aya_text_emlaey: وزرابي مبثوثة
Saheeh International Translation: And carpets spread around.

Ayah Text: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡإِبِلِ كَيۡفَ خُلِقَتۡ ١٧
aya_text_emlaey: أفلا ينظرون إلى الإبل كيف خلقت
Saheeh International Translation: Then do they not look at the camels - how they are created?

Ayah Text: وَإِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ كَيۡفَ رُفِعَتۡ ١٨
aya_text_emlaey: وإلى السماء كيف رفعت
Saheeh International Translation: And at the sky - how it is raised?

Ayah Text: وَإِلَى ٱلۡجِبَالِ كَيۡفَ نُصِبَتۡ ١٩
aya_text_emlaey: وإلى الجبال كيف نصبت
Saheeh International Translation: And at the mountains - how they are erected?

Ayah Text: وَإِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ كَيۡفَ سُطِحَتۡ ٢٠
aya_text_emlaey: وإلى الأرض كيف سطحت
Saheeh International Translation: And at the earth - how it is spread out?

Ayah Text: فَذَكِّرۡ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُذَكِّرٞ ٢١
aya_text_emlaey: فذكر إنما أنت مذكر
Saheeh International Translation: So remind, [O Muhammad]; you are only a reminder.

Ayah Text: لَّسۡتَ عَلَيۡهِم بِمُصَيۡطِرٍ ٢٢
aya_text_emlaey: لست عليهم بمصيطر
Saheeh International Translation: You are not over them a controller.

Ayah Text: إِلَّا مَن تَوَلَّىٰ وَكَفَرَ ٢٣
aya_text_emlaey: إلا من تولى وكفر
Saheeh International Translation: However, he who turns away and disbelieves -

Ayah Text: فَيُعَذِّبُهُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَكۡبَرَ ٢٤
aya_text_emlaey: فيعذبه الله العذاب الأكبر
Saheeh International Translation: Then Allah will punish him with the greatest punishment.

Ayah Text: إِنَّ إِلَيۡنَآ إِيَابَهُمۡ ٢٥
aya_text_emlaey: إن إلينا إيابهم
Saheeh International Translation: Indeed, to Us is their return.

Ayah Text: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيۡنَا حِسَابَهُم ٢٦
aya_text_emlaey: ثم إن علينا حسابهم
Saheeh International Translation: Then indeed, upon Us is their account.

Ayah Text: وَٱلۡفَجۡرِ ١
aya_text_emlaey: والفجر
Saheeh International Translation: By the dawn

Ayah Text: وَلَيَالٍ عَشۡرٖ ٢
aya_text_emlaey: وليال عشر
Saheeh International Translation: And [by] ten nights

Ayah Text: وَٱلشَّفۡعِ وَٱلۡوَتۡرِ ٣
aya_text_emlaey: والشفع والوتر
Saheeh International Translation: And [by] the even [number] and the odd

Ayah Text: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذَا يَسۡرِ ٤
aya_text_emlaey: والليل إذا يسر
Saheeh International Translation: And [by] the night when it passes,

Ayah Text: هَلۡ فِي ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٞ لِّذِي حِجۡرٍ ٥
aya_text_emlaey: هل في ذلك قسم لذي حجر
Saheeh International Translation: Is there [not] in [all] that an oath [sufficient] for one of perception?

Ayah Text: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ ٦
aya_text_emlaey: ألم تر كيف فعل ربك بعاد
Saheeh International Translation: Have you not considered how your Lord dealt with 'Aad -

Ayah Text: إِرَمَ ذَاتِ ٱلۡعِمَادِ ٧
aya_text_emlaey: إرم ذات العماد
Saheeh International Translation: [With] Iram - who had lofty pillars,

Ayah Text: ٱلَّتِي لَمۡ يُخۡلَقۡ مِثۡلُهَا فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ ٨
aya_text_emlaey: التي لم يخلق مثلها في البلاد
Saheeh International Translation: The likes of whom had never been created in the land?

Ayah Text: وَثَمُودَ ٱلَّذِينَ جَابُواْ ٱلصَّخۡرَ بِٱلۡوَادِ ٩
aya_text_emlaey: وثمود الذين جابوا الصخر بالواد
Saheeh International Translation: And [with] Thamud, who carved out the rocks in the valley?

Ayah Text: وَفِرۡعَوۡنَ ذِي ٱلۡأَوۡتَادِ ١٠
aya_text_emlaey: وفرعون ذي الأوتاد
Saheeh International Translation: And [with] Pharaoh, owner of the stakes? -

Ayah Text: ٱلَّذِينَ طَغَوۡاْ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ ١١
aya_text_emlaey: الذين طغوا في البلاد
Saheeh International Translation: [All of] whom oppressed within the lands

Ayah Text: فَأَكۡثَرُواْ فِيهَا ٱلۡفَسَادَ ١٢
aya_text_emlaey: فأكثروا فيها الفساد
Saheeh International Translation: And increased therein the corruption.

Ayah Text: فَصَبَّ عَلَيۡهِمۡ رَبُّكَ سَوۡطَ عَذَابٍ ١٣
aya_text_emlaey: فصب عليهم ربك سوط عذاب
Saheeh International Translation: So your Lord poured upon them a scourge of punishment.

Ayah Text: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِٱلۡمِرۡصَادِ ١٤
aya_text_emlaey: إن ربك لبالمرصاد
Saheeh International Translation: Indeed, your Lord is in observation.

Ayah Text: فَأَمَّا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ إِذَا مَا ٱبۡتَلَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَأَكۡرَمَهُۥ وَنَعَّمَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّيٓ أَكۡرَمَنِ ١٥
aya_text_emlaey: فأما الإنسان إذا ما ابتلاه ربه فأكرمه ونعمه فيقول ربي أكرمن
Saheeh International Translation: And as for man, when his Lord tries him and [thus] is generous to him and favors him, he says, "My Lord has honored me."

Ayah Text: وَأَمَّآ إِذَا مَا ٱبۡتَلَىٰهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيۡهِ رِزۡقَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّيٓ أَهَٰنَنِ ١٦
aya_text_emlaey: وأما إذا ما ابتلاه فقدر عليه رزقه فيقول ربي أهانن
Saheeh International Translation: But when He tries him and restricts his provision, he says, "My Lord has humiliated me."

Ayah Text: كَلَّاۖ بَل لَّا تُكۡرِمُونَ ٱلۡيَتِيمَ ١٧
aya_text_emlaey: كلا بل لا تكرمون اليتيم
Saheeh International Translation: No! But you do not honor the orphan

Ayah Text: وَلَا تَحَٰٓضُّونَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلۡمِسۡكِينِ ١٨
aya_text_emlaey: ولا تحاضون على طعام المسكين
Saheeh International Translation: And you do not encourage one another to feed the poor.

Ayah Text: وَتَأۡكُلُونَ ٱلتُّرَاثَ أَكۡلٗا لَّمّٗا ١٩
aya_text_emlaey: وتأكلون التراث أكلا لما
Saheeh International Translation: And you consume inheritance, devouring [it] altogether,

Ayah Text: وَتُحِبُّونَ ٱلۡمَالَ حُبّٗا جَمّٗا ٢٠
aya_text_emlaey: وتحبون المال حبا جما
Saheeh International Translation: And you love wealth with immense love.

Ayah Text: كَلَّآۖ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ دَكّٗا دَكّٗا ٢١
aya_text_emlaey: كلا إذا دكت الأرض دكا دكا
Saheeh International Translation: No! When the earth has been leveled - pounded and crushed -

Ayah Text: وَجَآءَ رَبُّكَ وَٱلۡمَلَكُ صَفّٗا صَفّٗا ٢٢
aya_text_emlaey: وجاء ربك والملك صفا صفا
Saheeh International Translation: And your Lord has come and the angels, rank upon rank,

Ayah Text: وَجِاْيٓءَ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِجَهَنَّمَۚ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ ٢٣
aya_text_emlaey: وجيء يومئذ بجهنم يومئذ يتذكر الإنسان وأنى له الذكرى
Saheeh International Translation: And brought [within view], that Day, is Hell - that Day, man will remember, but what good to him will be the remembrance?

Ayah Text: يَقُولُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي قَدَّمۡتُ لِحَيَاتِي ٢٤
aya_text_emlaey: يقول ياليتني قدمت لحياتي
Saheeh International Translation: He will say, "Oh, I wish I had sent ahead [some good] for my life."

Ayah Text: فَيَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُۥٓ أَحَدٞ ٢٥
aya_text_emlaey: فيومئذ لا يعذب عذابه أحد
Saheeh International Translation: So on that Day, none will punish [as severely] as His punishment,

Ayah Text: وَلَا يُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُۥٓ أَحَدٞ ٢٦
aya_text_emlaey: ولا يوثق وثاقه أحد
Saheeh International Translation: And none will bind [as severely] as His binding [of the evildoers].

Ayah Text: يَٰٓأَيَّتُهَا ٱلنَّفۡسُ ٱلۡمُطۡمَئِنَّةُ ٢٧
aya_text_emlaey: ياأيتها النفس المطمئنة
Saheeh International Translation: [To the righteous it will be said], "O reassured soul,

Ayah Text: ٱرۡجِعِيٓ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةٗ مَّرۡضِيَّةٗ ٢٨
aya_text_emlaey: ارجعي إلى ربك راضية مرضية
Saheeh International Translation: Return to your Lord, well-pleased and pleasing [to Him],

Ayah Text: فَٱدۡخُلِي فِي عِبَٰدِي ٢٩
aya_text_emlaey: فادخلي في عبادي
Saheeh International Translation: And enter among My [righteous] servants

Ayah Text: وَٱدۡخُلِي جَنَّتِي ٣٠
aya_text_emlaey: وادخلي جنتي
Saheeh International Translation: And enter My Paradise."

Ayah Text: لَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِهَٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدِ ١
aya_text_emlaey: لا أقسم بهذا البلد
Saheeh International Translation: I swear by this city, Makkah -

Ayah Text: وَأَنتَ حِلُّۢ بِهَٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدِ ٢
aya_text_emlaey: وأنت حل بهذا البلد
Saheeh International Translation: And you, [O Muhammad], are free of restriction in this city -

Ayah Text: وَوَالِدٖ وَمَا وَلَدَ ٣
aya_text_emlaey: ووالد وما ولد
Saheeh International Translation: And [by] the father and that which was born [of him],

Ayah Text: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ فِي كَبَدٍ ٤
aya_text_emlaey: لقد خلقنا الإنسان في كبد
Saheeh International Translation: We have certainly created man into hardship.

Ayah Text: أَيَحۡسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقۡدِرَ عَلَيۡهِ أَحَدٞ ٥
aya_text_emlaey: أيحسب أن لن يقدر عليه أحد
Saheeh International Translation: Does he think that never will anyone overcome him?

Ayah Text: يَقُولُ أَهۡلَكۡتُ مَالٗا لُّبَدًا ٦
aya_text_emlaey: يقول أهلكت مالا لبدا
Saheeh International Translation: He says, "I have spent wealth in abundance."

Ayah Text: أَيَحۡسَبُ أَن لَّمۡ يَرَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌ ٧
aya_text_emlaey: أيحسب أن لم يره أحد
Saheeh International Translation: Does he think that no one has seen him?

Ayah Text: أَلَمۡ نَجۡعَل لَّهُۥ عَيۡنَيۡنِ ٨
aya_text_emlaey: ألم نجعل له عينين
Saheeh International Translation: Have We not made for him two eyes?

Ayah Text: وَلِسَانٗا وَشَفَتَيۡنِ ٩
aya_text_emlaey: ولسانا وشفتين
Saheeh International Translation: And a tongue and two lips?

Ayah Text: وَهَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلنَّجۡدَيۡنِ ١٠
aya_text_emlaey: وهديناه النجدين
Saheeh International Translation: And have shown him the two ways?

Ayah Text: فَلَا ٱقۡتَحَمَ ٱلۡعَقَبَةَ ١١
aya_text_emlaey: فلا اقتحم العقبة
Saheeh International Translation: But he has not broken through the difficult pass.

Ayah Text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلۡعَقَبَةُ ١٢
aya_text_emlaey: وما أدراك ما العقبة
Saheeh International Translation: And what can make you know what is [breaking through] the difficult pass?

Ayah Text: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ ١٣
aya_text_emlaey: فك رقبة
Saheeh International Translation: It is the freeing of a slave

Ayah Text: أَوۡ إِطۡعَٰمٞ فِي يَوۡمٖ ذِي مَسۡغَبَةٖ ١٤
aya_text_emlaey: أو إطعام في يوم ذي مسغبة
Saheeh International Translation: Or feeding on a day of severe hunger

Ayah Text: يَتِيمٗا ذَا مَقۡرَبَةٍ ١٥
aya_text_emlaey: يتيما ذا مقربة
Saheeh International Translation: An orphan of near relationship

Ayah Text: أَوۡ مِسۡكِينٗا ذَا مَتۡرَبَةٖ ١٦
aya_text_emlaey: أو مسكينا ذا متربة
Saheeh International Translation: Or a needy person in misery

Ayah Text: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلۡمَرۡحَمَةِ ١٧
aya_text_emlaey: ثم كان من الذين آمنوا وتواصوا بالصبر وتواصوا بالمرحمة
Saheeh International Translation: And then being among those who believed and advised one another to patience and advised one another to compassion.

Ayah Text: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡمَيۡمَنَةِ ١٨
aya_text_emlaey: أولئك أصحاب الميمنة
Saheeh International Translation: Those are the companions of the right.

Ayah Text: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا هُمۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡمَشۡـَٔمَةِ ١٩
aya_text_emlaey: والذين كفروا بآياتنا هم أصحاب المشأمة
Saheeh International Translation: But they who disbelieved in Our signs - those are the companions of the left.

Ayah Text: عَلَيۡهِمۡ نَارٞ مُّؤۡصَدَةُۢ ٢٠
aya_text_emlaey: عليهم نار مؤصدة
Saheeh International Translation: Over them will be fire closed in.

Ayah Text: وَٱلشَّمۡسِ وَضُحَىٰهَا ١
aya_text_emlaey: والشمس وضحاها
Saheeh International Translation: By the sun and its brightness

Ayah Text: وَٱلۡقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلَىٰهَا ٢
aya_text_emlaey: والقمر إذا تلاها
Saheeh International Translation: And [by] the moon when it follows it

Ayah Text: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا جَلَّىٰهَا ٣
aya_text_emlaey: والنهار إذا جلاها
Saheeh International Translation: And [by] the day when it displays it

Ayah Text: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذَا يَغۡشَىٰهَا ٤
aya_text_emlaey: والليل إذا يغشاها
Saheeh International Translation: And [by] the night when it covers it

Ayah Text: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا بَنَىٰهَا ٥
aya_text_emlaey: والسماء وما بناها
Saheeh International Translation: And [by] the sky and He who constructed it

Ayah Text: وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا طَحَىٰهَا ٦
aya_text_emlaey: والأرض وما طحاها
Saheeh International Translation: And [by] the earth and He who spread it

Ayah Text: وَنَفۡسٖ وَمَا سَوَّىٰهَا ٧
aya_text_emlaey: ونفس وما سواها
Saheeh International Translation: And [by] the soul and He who proportioned it

Ayah Text: فَأَلۡهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقۡوَىٰهَا ٨
aya_text_emlaey: فألهمها فجورها وتقواها
Saheeh International Translation: And inspired it [with discernment of] its wickedness and its righteousness,

Ayah Text: قَدۡ أَفۡلَحَ مَن زَكَّىٰهَا ٩
aya_text_emlaey: قد أفلح من زكاها
Saheeh International Translation: He has succeeded who purifies it,

Ayah Text: وَقَدۡ خَابَ مَن دَسَّىٰهَا ١٠
aya_text_emlaey: وقد خاب من دساها
Saheeh International Translation: And he has failed who instills it [with corruption].

Ayah Text: كَذَّبَتۡ ثَمُودُ بِطَغۡوَىٰهَآ ١١
aya_text_emlaey: كذبت ثمود بطغواها
Saheeh International Translation: Thamud denied [their prophet] by reason of their transgression,

Ayah Text: إِذِ ٱنۢبَعَثَ أَشۡقَىٰهَا ١٢
aya_text_emlaey: إذ انبعث أشقاها
Saheeh International Translation: When the most wretched of them was sent forth.

Ayah Text: فَقَالَ لَهُمۡ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقۡيَٰهَا ١٣
aya_text_emlaey: فقال لهم رسول الله ناقة الله وسقياها
Saheeh International Translation: And the messenger of Allah [Salih] said to them, "[Do not harm] the she-camel of Allah or [prevent her from] her drink."

Ayah Text: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمۡدَمَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمۡ فَسَوَّىٰهَا ١٤
aya_text_emlaey: فكذبوه فعقروها فدمدم عليهم ربهم بذنبهم فسواها
Saheeh International Translation: But they denied him and hamstrung her. So their Lord brought down upon them destruction for their sin and made it equal [upon all of them].

Ayah Text: وَلَا يَخَافُ عُقۡبَٰهَا ١٥
aya_text_emlaey: ولا يخاف عقباها
Saheeh International Translation: And He does not fear the consequence thereof.

Ayah Text: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذَا يَغۡشَىٰ ١
aya_text_emlaey: والليل إذا يغشى
Saheeh International Translation: By the night when it covers

Ayah Text: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّىٰ ٢
aya_text_emlaey: والنهار إذا تجلى
Saheeh International Translation: And [by] the day when it appears

Ayah Text: وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلۡأُنثَىٰٓ ٣
aya_text_emlaey: وما خلق الذكر والأنثى
Saheeh International Translation: And [by] He who created the male and female,

Ayah Text: إِنَّ سَعۡيَكُمۡ لَشَتَّىٰ ٤
aya_text_emlaey: إن سعيكم لشتى
Saheeh International Translation: Indeed, your efforts are diverse.

Ayah Text: فَأَمَّا مَنۡ أَعۡطَىٰ وَٱتَّقَىٰ ٥
aya_text_emlaey: فأما من أعطى واتقى
Saheeh International Translation: As for he who gives and fears Allah

Ayah Text: وَصَدَّقَ بِٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ ٦
aya_text_emlaey: وصدق بالحسنى
Saheeh International Translation: And believes in the best [reward],

Ayah Text: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلۡيُسۡرَىٰ ٧
aya_text_emlaey: فسنيسره لليسرى
Saheeh International Translation: We will ease him toward ease.

Ayah Text: وَأَمَّا مَنۢ بَخِلَ وَٱسۡتَغۡنَىٰ ٨
aya_text_emlaey: وأما من بخل واستغنى
Saheeh International Translation: But as for he who withholds and considers himself free of need

Ayah Text: وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ ٩
aya_text_emlaey: وكذب بالحسنى
Saheeh International Translation: And denies the best [reward],

Ayah Text: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلۡعُسۡرَىٰ ١٠
aya_text_emlaey: فسنيسره للعسرى
Saheeh International Translation: We will ease him toward difficulty.

Ayah Text: وَمَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ ١١
aya_text_emlaey: وما يغني عنه ماله إذا تردى
Saheeh International Translation: And what will his wealth avail him when he falls?

Ayah Text: إِنَّ عَلَيۡنَا لَلۡهُدَىٰ ١٢
aya_text_emlaey: إن علينا للهدى
Saheeh International Translation: Indeed, [incumbent] upon Us is guidance.

Ayah Text: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلۡأٓخِرَةَ وَٱلۡأُولَىٰ ١٣
aya_text_emlaey: وإن لنا للآخرة والأولى
Saheeh International Translation: And indeed, to Us belongs the Hereafter and the first [life].

Ayah Text: فَأَنذَرۡتُكُمۡ نَارٗا تَلَظَّىٰ ١٤
aya_text_emlaey: فأنذرتكم نارا تلظى
Saheeh International Translation: So I have warned you of a Fire which is blazing.

Ayah Text: لَا يَصۡلَىٰهَآ إِلَّا ٱلۡأَشۡقَى ١٥
aya_text_emlaey: لا يصلاها إلا الأشقى
Saheeh International Translation: None will [enter to] burn therein except the most wretched one.

Ayah Text: ٱلَّذِي كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ ١٦
aya_text_emlaey: الذي كذب وتولى
Saheeh International Translation: Who had denied and turned away.

Ayah Text: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا ٱلۡأَتۡقَى ١٧
aya_text_emlaey: وسيجنبها الأتقى
Saheeh International Translation: But the righteous one will avoid it -

Ayah Text: ٱلَّذِي يُؤۡتِي مَالَهُۥ يَتَزَكَّىٰ ١٨
aya_text_emlaey: الذي يؤتي ماله يتزكى
Saheeh International Translation: [He] who gives [from] his wealth to purify himself

Ayah Text: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُۥ مِن نِّعۡمَةٖ تُجۡزَىٰٓ ١٩
aya_text_emlaey: وما لأحد عنده من نعمة تجزى
Saheeh International Translation: And not [giving] for anyone who has [done him] a favor to be rewarded

Ayah Text: إِلَّا ٱبۡتِغَآءَ وَجۡهِ رَبِّهِ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ ٢٠
aya_text_emlaey: إلا ابتغاء وجه ربه الأعلى
Saheeh International Translation: But only seeking the countenance of his Lord, Most High.

Ayah Text: وَلَسَوۡفَ يَرۡضَىٰ ٢١
aya_text_emlaey: ولسوف يرضى
Saheeh International Translation: And he is going to be satisfied.

Ayah Text: وَٱلضُّحَىٰ ١
aya_text_emlaey: والضحى
Saheeh International Translation: By the morning brightness

Ayah Text: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذَا سَجَىٰ ٢
aya_text_emlaey: والليل إذا سجى
Saheeh International Translation: And [by] the night when it covers with darkness,

Ayah Text: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ ٣
aya_text_emlaey: ما ودعك ربك وما قلى
Saheeh International Translation: Your Lord has not taken leave of you, [O Muhammad], nor has He detested [you].

Ayah Text: وَلَلۡأٓخِرَةُ خَيۡرٞ لَّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ ٤
aya_text_emlaey: وللآخرة خير لك من الأولى
Saheeh International Translation: And the Hereafter is better for you than the first [life].

Ayah Text: وَلَسَوۡفَ يُعۡطِيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرۡضَىٰٓ ٥
aya_text_emlaey: ولسوف يعطيك ربك فترضى
Saheeh International Translation: And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied.

Ayah Text: أَلَمۡ يَجِدۡكَ يَتِيمٗا فَـَٔاوَىٰ ٦
aya_text_emlaey: ألم يجدك يتيما فآوى
Saheeh International Translation: Did He not find you an orphan and give [you] refuge?

Ayah Text: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَآلّٗا فَهَدَىٰ ٧
aya_text_emlaey: ووجدك ضالا فهدى
Saheeh International Translation: And He found you lost and guided [you],

Ayah Text: وَوَجَدَكَ عَآئِلٗا فَأَغۡنَىٰ ٨
aya_text_emlaey: ووجدك عائلا فأغنى
Saheeh International Translation: And He found you poor and made [you] self-sufficient.

Ayah Text: فَأَمَّا ٱلۡيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَقۡهَرۡ ٩
aya_text_emlaey: فأما اليتيم فلا تقهر
Saheeh International Translation: So as for the orphan, do not oppress [him].

Ayah Text: وَأَمَّا ٱلسَّآئِلَ فَلَا تَنۡهَرۡ ١٠
aya_text_emlaey: وأما السائل فلا تنهر
Saheeh International Translation: And as for the petitioner, do not repel [him].

Ayah Text: وَأَمَّا بِنِعۡمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثۡ ١١
aya_text_emlaey: وأما بنعمة ربك فحدث
Saheeh International Translation: But as for the favor of your Lord, report [it].

Ayah Text: أَلَمۡ نَشۡرَحۡ لَكَ صَدۡرَكَ ١
aya_text_emlaey: ألم نشرح لك صدرك
Saheeh International Translation: Did We not expand for you, [O Muhammad], your breast?

Ayah Text: وَوَضَعۡنَا عَنكَ وِزۡرَكَ ٢
aya_text_emlaey: ووضعنا عنك وزرك
Saheeh International Translation: And We removed from you your burden

Ayah Text: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنقَضَ ظَهۡرَكَ ٣
aya_text_emlaey: الذي أنقض ظهرك
Saheeh International Translation: Which had weighed upon your back

Ayah Text: وَرَفَعۡنَا لَكَ ذِكۡرَكَ ٤
aya_text_emlaey: ورفعنا لك ذكرك
Saheeh International Translation: And raised high for you your repute.

Ayah Text: فَإِنَّ مَعَ ٱلۡعُسۡرِ يُسۡرًا ٥
aya_text_emlaey: فإن مع العسر يسرا
Saheeh International Translation: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

Ayah Text: إِنَّ مَعَ ٱلۡعُسۡرِ يُسۡرٗا ٦
aya_text_emlaey: إن مع العسر يسرا
Saheeh International Translation: Indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

Ayah Text: فَإِذَا فَرَغۡتَ فَٱنصَبۡ ٧
aya_text_emlaey: فإذا فرغت فانصب
Saheeh International Translation: So when you have finished [your duties], then stand up [for worship].

Ayah Text: وَإِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَٱرۡغَب ٨
aya_text_emlaey: وإلى ربك فارغب
Saheeh International Translation: And to your Lord direct [your] longing.

Ayah Text: وَٱلتِّينِ وَٱلزَّيۡتُونِ ١
aya_text_emlaey: والتين والزيتون
Saheeh International Translation: By the fig and the olive

Ayah Text: وَطُورِ سِينِينَ ٢
aya_text_emlaey: وطور سينين
Saheeh International Translation: And [by] Mount Sinai

Ayah Text: وَهَٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدِ ٱلۡأَمِينِ ٣
aya_text_emlaey: وهذا البلد الأمين
Saheeh International Translation: And [by] this secure city [Makkah],

Ayah Text: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ فِيٓ أَحۡسَنِ تَقۡوِيمٖ ٤
aya_text_emlaey: لقد خلقنا الإنسان في أحسن تقويم
Saheeh International Translation: We have certainly created man in the best of stature;

Ayah Text: ثُمَّ رَدَدۡنَٰهُ أَسۡفَلَ سَٰفِلِينَ ٥
aya_text_emlaey: ثم رددناه أسفل سافلين
Saheeh International Translation: Then We return him to the lowest of the low,

Ayah Text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَلَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونٖ ٦
aya_text_emlaey: إلا الذين آمنوا وعملوا الصالحات فلهم أجر غير ممنون
Saheeh International Translation: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds, for they will have a reward uninterrupted.

Ayah Text: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعۡدُ بِٱلدِّينِ ٧
aya_text_emlaey: فما يكذبك بعد بالدين
Saheeh International Translation: So what yet causes you to deny the Recompense?

Ayah Text: أَلَيۡسَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَحۡكَمِ ٱلۡحَٰكِمِينَ ٨
aya_text_emlaey: أليس الله بأحكم الحاكمين
Saheeh International Translation: Is not Allah the most just of judges?

Ayah Text: ٱقۡرَأۡ بِٱسۡمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ١
aya_text_emlaey: اقرأ باسم ربك الذي خلق
Saheeh International Translation: Recite in the name of your Lord who created -

Ayah Text: خَلَقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِنۡ عَلَقٍ ٢
aya_text_emlaey: خلق الإنسان من علق
Saheeh International Translation: Created man from a clinging substance.

Ayah Text: ٱقۡرَأۡ وَرَبُّكَ ٱلۡأَكۡرَمُ ٣
aya_text_emlaey: اقرأ وربك الأكرم
Saheeh International Translation: Recite, and your Lord is the most Generous -

Ayah Text: ٱلَّذِي عَلَّمَ بِٱلۡقَلَمِ ٤
aya_text_emlaey: الذي علم بالقلم
Saheeh International Translation: Who taught by the pen -

Ayah Text: عَلَّمَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مَا لَمۡ يَعۡلَمۡ ٥
aya_text_emlaey: علم الإنسان ما لم يعلم
Saheeh International Translation: Taught man that which he knew not.

Ayah Text: كَلَّآ إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لَيَطۡغَىٰٓ ٦
aya_text_emlaey: كلا إن الإنسان ليطغى
Saheeh International Translation: No! [But] indeed, man transgresses

Ayah Text: أَن رَّءَاهُ ٱسۡتَغۡنَىٰٓ ٧
aya_text_emlaey: أن رآه استغنى
Saheeh International Translation: Because he sees himself self-sufficient.

Ayah Text: إِنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ ٱلرُّجۡعَىٰٓ ٨
aya_text_emlaey: إن إلى ربك الرجعى
Saheeh International Translation: Indeed, to your Lord is the return.

Ayah Text: أَرَءَيۡتَ ٱلَّذِي يَنۡهَىٰ ٩
aya_text_emlaey: أرأيت الذي ينهى
Saheeh International Translation: Have you seen the one who forbids

Ayah Text: عَبۡدًا إِذَا صَلَّىٰٓ ١٠
aya_text_emlaey: عبدا إذا صلى
Saheeh International Translation: A servant when he prays?

Ayah Text: أَرَءَيۡتَ إِن كَانَ عَلَى ٱلۡهُدَىٰٓ ١١
aya_text_emlaey: أرأيت إن كان على الهدى
Saheeh International Translation: Have you seen if he is upon guidance

Ayah Text: أَوۡ أَمَرَ بِٱلتَّقۡوَىٰٓ ١٢
aya_text_emlaey: أو أمر بالتقوى
Saheeh International Translation: Or enjoins righteousness?

Ayah Text: أَرَءَيۡتَ إِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ ١٣
aya_text_emlaey: أرأيت إن كذب وتولى
Saheeh International Translation: Have you seen if he denies and turns away -

Ayah Text: أَلَمۡ يَعۡلَم بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَرَىٰ ١٤
aya_text_emlaey: ألم يعلم بأن الله يرى
Saheeh International Translation: Does he not know that Allah sees?

Ayah Text: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمۡ يَنتَهِ لَنَسۡفَعَۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ ١٥
aya_text_emlaey: كلا لئن لم ينته لنسفعا بالناصية
Saheeh International Translation: No! If he does not desist, We will surely drag him by the forelock -

Ayah Text: نَاصِيَةٖ كَٰذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةٖ ١٦
aya_text_emlaey: ناصية كاذبة خاطئة
Saheeh International Translation: A lying, sinning forelock.

Ayah Text: فَلۡيَدۡعُ نَادِيَهُۥ ١٧
aya_text_emlaey: فليدع ناديه
Saheeh International Translation: Then let him call his associates;

Ayah Text: سَنَدۡعُ ٱلزَّبَانِيَةَ ١٨
aya_text_emlaey: سندع الزبانية
Saheeh International Translation: We will call the angels of Hell.

Ayah Text: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعۡهُ وَٱسۡجُدۡۤ وَٱقۡتَرِب۩ ١٩
aya_text_emlaey: كلا لا تطعه واسجد واقترب
Saheeh International Translation: No! Do not obey him. But prostrate and draw near [to Allah].

Ayah Text: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ فِي لَيۡلَةِ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ ١
aya_text_emlaey: إنا أنزلناه في ليلة القدر
Saheeh International Translation: Indeed, We sent the Qur'an down during the Night of Decree.

Ayah Text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ ٢
aya_text_emlaey: وما أدراك ما ليلة القدر
Saheeh International Translation: And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree?

Ayah Text: لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرٖ ٣
aya_text_emlaey: ليلة القدر خير من ألف شهر
Saheeh International Translation: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.

Ayah Text: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمۡرٖ ٤
aya_text_emlaey: تنزل الملائكة والروح فيها بإذن ربهم من كل أمر
Saheeh International Translation: The angels and the Spirit descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter.

Ayah Text: سَلَٰمٌ هِيَ حَتَّىٰ مَطۡلَعِ ٱلۡفَجۡرِ ٥
aya_text_emlaey: سلام هي حتى مطلع الفجر
Saheeh International Translation: Peace it is until the emergence of dawn.

Ayah Text: لَمۡ يَكُنِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأۡتِيَهُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَةُ ١
aya_text_emlaey: لم يكن الذين كفروا من أهل الكتاب والمشركين منفكين حتى تأتيهم البينة
Saheeh International Translation: Those who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists were not to be parted [from misbelief] until there came to them clear evidence -

Ayah Text: رَسُولٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتۡلُواْ صُحُفٗا مُّطَهَّرَةٗ ٢
aya_text_emlaey: رسول من الله يتلو صحفا مطهرة
Saheeh International Translation: A Messenger from Allah, reciting purified scriptures

Ayah Text: فِيهَا كُتُبٞ قَيِّمَةٞ ٣
aya_text_emlaey: فيها كتب قيمة
Saheeh International Translation: Within which are correct writings.

Ayah Text: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَتۡهُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَةُ ٤
aya_text_emlaey: وما تفرق الذين أوتوا الكتاب إلا من بعد ما جاءتهم البينة
Saheeh International Translation: Nor did those who were given the Scripture become divided until after there had come to them clear evidence.

Ayah Text: وَمَآ أُمِرُوٓاْ إِلَّا لِيَعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ حُنَفَآءَ وَيُقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤۡتُواْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَۚ وَذَٰلِكَ دِينُ ٱلۡقَيِّمَةِ ٥
aya_text_emlaey: وما أمروا إلا ليعبدوا الله مخلصين له الدين حنفاء ويقيموا الصلاة ويؤتوا الزكاة وذلك دين القيمة
Saheeh International Translation: And they were not commanded except to worship Allah, [being] sincere to Him in religion, inclining to truth, and to establish prayer and to give zakah. And that is the correct religion.

Ayah Text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ فِي نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمۡ شَرُّ ٱلۡبَرِيَّةِ ٦
aya_text_emlaey: إن الذين كفروا من أهل الكتاب والمشركين في نار جهنم خالدين فيها أولئك هم شر البرية
Saheeh International Translation: Indeed, they who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists will be in the fire of Hell, abiding eternally therein. Those are the worst of creatures.

Ayah Text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمۡ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡبَرِيَّةِ ٧
aya_text_emlaey: إن الذين آمنوا وعملوا الصالحات أولئك هم خير البرية
Saheeh International Translation: Indeed, they who have believed and done righteous deeds - those are the best of creatures.

Ayah Text: جَزَآؤُهُمۡ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ جَنَّٰتُ عَدۡنٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۖ رَّضِيَ ٱللَّهُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَرَضُواْ عَنۡهُۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنۡ خَشِيَ رَبَّهُۥ ٨
aya_text_emlaey: جزاؤهم عند ربهم جنات عدن تجري من تحتها الأنهار خالدين فيها أبدا رضي الله عنهم ورضوا عنه ذلك لمن خشي ربه
Saheeh International Translation: Their reward with Allah will be gardens of perpetual residence beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever, Allah being pleased with them and they with Him. That is for whoever has feared his Lord.

Ayah Text: إِذَا زُلۡزِلَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ زِلۡزَالَهَا ١
aya_text_emlaey: إذا زلزلت الأرض زلزالها
Saheeh International Translation: When the earth is shaken with its [final] earthquake

Ayah Text: وَأَخۡرَجَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ أَثۡقَالَهَا ٢
aya_text_emlaey: وأخرجت الأرض أثقالها
Saheeh International Translation: And the earth discharges its burdens

Ayah Text: وَقَالَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا لَهَا ٣
aya_text_emlaey: وقال الإنسان ما لها
Saheeh International Translation: And man says, "What is [wrong] with it?" -

Ayah Text: يَوۡمَئِذٖ تُحَدِّثُ أَخۡبَارَهَا ٤
aya_text_emlaey: يومئذ تحدث أخبارها
Saheeh International Translation: That Day, it will report its news

Ayah Text: بِأَنَّ رَبَّكَ أَوۡحَىٰ لَهَا ٥
aya_text_emlaey: بأن ربك أوحى لها
Saheeh International Translation: Because your Lord has commanded it.

Ayah Text: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَصۡدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشۡتَاتٗا لِّيُرَوۡاْ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ ٦
aya_text_emlaey: يومئذ يصدر الناس أشتاتا ليروا أعمالهم
Saheeh International Translation: That Day, the people will depart separated [into categories] to be shown [the result of] their deeds.

Ayah Text: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيۡرٗا يَرَهُۥ ٧
aya_text_emlaey: فمن يعمل مثقال ذرة خيرا يره
Saheeh International Translation: So whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it,

Ayah Text: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ شَرّٗا يَرَهُۥ ٨
aya_text_emlaey: ومن يعمل مثقال ذرة شرا يره
Saheeh International Translation: And whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it.

Ayah Text: وَٱلۡعَٰدِيَٰتِ ضَبۡحٗا ١
aya_text_emlaey: والعاديات ضبحا
Saheeh International Translation: By the racers, panting,

Ayah Text: فَٱلۡمُورِيَٰتِ قَدۡحٗا ٢
aya_text_emlaey: فالموريات قدحا
Saheeh International Translation: And the producers of sparks [when] striking

Ayah Text: فَٱلۡمُغِيرَٰتِ صُبۡحٗا ٣
aya_text_emlaey: فالمغيرات صبحا
Saheeh International Translation: And the chargers at dawn,

Ayah Text: فَأَثَرۡنَ بِهِۦ نَقۡعٗا ٤
aya_text_emlaey: فأثرن به نقعا
Saheeh International Translation: Stirring up thereby [clouds of] dust,

Ayah Text: فَوَسَطۡنَ بِهِۦ جَمۡعًا ٥
aya_text_emlaey: فوسطن به جمعا
Saheeh International Translation: Arriving thereby in the center collectively,

Ayah Text: إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لِرَبِّهِۦ لَكَنُودٞ ٦
aya_text_emlaey: إن الإنسان لربه لكنود
Saheeh International Translation: Indeed mankind, to his Lord, is ungrateful.

Ayah Text: وَإِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ لَشَهِيدٞ ٧
aya_text_emlaey: وإنه على ذلك لشهيد
Saheeh International Translation: And indeed, he is to that a witness.

Ayah Text: وَإِنَّهُۥ لِحُبِّ ٱلۡخَيۡرِ لَشَدِيدٌ ٨
aya_text_emlaey: وإنه لحب الخير لشديد
Saheeh International Translation: And indeed he is, in love of wealth, intense.

Ayah Text: ۞ أَفَلَا يَعۡلَمُ إِذَا بُعۡثِرَ مَا فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ ٩
aya_text_emlaey: أفلا يعلم إذا بعثر ما في القبور
Saheeh International Translation: But does he not know that when the contents of the graves are scattered

Ayah Text: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِي ٱلصُّدُورِ ١٠
aya_text_emlaey: وحصل ما في الصدور
Saheeh International Translation: And that within the breasts is obtained,

Ayah Text: إِنَّ رَبَّهُم بِهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّخَبِيرُۢ ١١
aya_text_emlaey: إن ربهم بهم يومئذ لخبير
Saheeh International Translation: Indeed, their Lord with them, that Day, is [fully] Acquainted.

Ayah Text: ٱلۡقَارِعَةُ ١
aya_text_emlaey: القارعة
Saheeh International Translation: The Striking Calamity -

Ayah Text: مَا ٱلۡقَارِعَةُ ٢
aya_text_emlaey: ما القارعة
Saheeh International Translation: What is the Striking Calamity?

Ayah Text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلۡقَارِعَةُ ٣
aya_text_emlaey: وما أدراك ما القارعة
Saheeh International Translation: And what can make you know what is the Striking Calamity?

Ayah Text: يَوۡمَ يَكُونُ ٱلنَّاسُ كَٱلۡفَرَاشِ ٱلۡمَبۡثُوثِ ٤
aya_text_emlaey: يوم يكون الناس كالفراش المبثوث
Saheeh International Translation: It is the Day when people will be like moths, dispersed,

Ayah Text: وَتَكُونُ ٱلۡجِبَالُ كَٱلۡعِهۡنِ ٱلۡمَنفُوشِ ٥
aya_text_emlaey: وتكون الجبال كالعهن المنفوش
Saheeh International Translation: And the mountains will be like wool, fluffed up.

Ayah Text: فَأَمَّا مَن ثَقُلَتۡ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ ٦
aya_text_emlaey: فأما من ثقلت موازينه
Saheeh International Translation: Then as for one whose scales are heavy [with good deeds],

Ayah Text: فَهُوَ فِي عِيشَةٖ رَّاضِيَةٖ ٧
aya_text_emlaey: فهو في عيشة راضية
Saheeh International Translation: He will be in a pleasant life.

Ayah Text: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ خَفَّتۡ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ ٨
aya_text_emlaey: وأما من خفت موازينه
Saheeh International Translation: But as for one whose scales are light,

Ayah Text: فَأُمُّهُۥ هَاوِيَةٞ ٩
aya_text_emlaey: فأمه هاوية
Saheeh International Translation: His refuge will be an abyss.

Ayah Text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا هِيَهۡ ١٠
aya_text_emlaey: وما أدراك ما هيه
Saheeh International Translation: And what can make you know what that is?

Ayah Text: نَارٌ حَامِيَةُۢ ١١
aya_text_emlaey: نار حامية
Saheeh International Translation: It is a Fire, intensely hot.

Ayah Text: أَلۡهَىٰكُمُ ٱلتَّكَاثُرُ ١
aya_text_emlaey: ألهاكم التكاثر
Saheeh International Translation: Competition in [worldly] increase diverts you

Ayah Text: حَتَّىٰ زُرۡتُمُ ٱلۡمَقَابِرَ ٢
aya_text_emlaey: حتى زرتم المقابر
Saheeh International Translation: Until you visit the graveyards.

Ayah Text: كَلَّا سَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ ٣
aya_text_emlaey: كلا سوف تعلمون
Saheeh International Translation: No! You are going to know.

Ayah Text: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ ٤
aya_text_emlaey: ثم كلا سوف تعلمون
Saheeh International Translation: Then no! You are going to know.

Ayah Text: كَلَّا لَوۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ عِلۡمَ ٱلۡيَقِينِ ٥
aya_text_emlaey: كلا لو تعلمون علم اليقين
Saheeh International Translation: No! If you only knew with knowledge of certainty...

Ayah Text: لَتَرَوُنَّ ٱلۡجَحِيمَ ٦
aya_text_emlaey: لترون الجحيم
Saheeh International Translation: You will surely see the Hellfire.

Ayah Text: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّهَا عَيۡنَ ٱلۡيَقِينِ ٧
aya_text_emlaey: ثم لترونها عين اليقين
Saheeh International Translation: Then you will surely see it with the eye of certainty.

Ayah Text: ثُمَّ لَتُسۡـَٔلُنَّ يَوۡمَئِذٍ عَنِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ ٨
aya_text_emlaey: ثم لتسألن يومئذ عن النعيم
Saheeh International Translation: Then you will surely be asked that Day about pleasure.

Ayah Text: وَٱلۡعَصۡرِ ١
aya_text_emlaey: والعصر
Saheeh International Translation: By time,

Ayah Text: إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لَفِي خُسۡرٍ ٢
aya_text_emlaey: إن الإنسان لفي خسر
Saheeh International Translation: Indeed, mankind is in loss,

Ayah Text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ ٣
aya_text_emlaey: إلا الذين آمنوا وعملوا الصالحات وتواصوا بالحق وتواصوا بالصبر
Saheeh International Translation: Except for those who have believed and done righteous deeds and advised each other to truth and advised each other to patience.

Ayah Text: وَيۡلٞ لِّكُلِّ هُمَزَةٖ لُّمَزَةٍ ١
aya_text_emlaey: ويل لكل همزة لمزة
Saheeh International Translation: Woe to every scorner and mocker

Ayah Text: ٱلَّذِي جَمَعَ مَالٗا وَعَدَّدَهُۥ ٢
aya_text_emlaey: الذي جمع مالا وعدده
Saheeh International Translation: Who collects wealth and [continuously] counts it.

Ayah Text: يَحۡسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُۥٓ أَخۡلَدَهُۥ ٣
aya_text_emlaey: يحسب أن ماله أخلده
Saheeh International Translation: He thinks that his wealth will make him immortal.

Ayah Text: كَلَّاۖ لَيُنۢبَذَنَّ فِي ٱلۡحُطَمَةِ ٤
aya_text_emlaey: كلا لينبذن في الحطمة
Saheeh International Translation: No! He will surely be thrown into the Crusher.

Ayah Text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلۡحُطَمَةُ ٥
aya_text_emlaey: وما أدراك ما الحطمة
Saheeh International Translation: And what can make you know what is the Crusher?

Ayah Text: نَارُ ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡمُوقَدَةُ ٦
aya_text_emlaey: نار الله الموقدة
Saheeh International Translation: It is the fire of Allah, [eternally] fueled,

Ayah Text: ٱلَّتِي تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى ٱلۡأَفۡـِٔدَةِ ٧
aya_text_emlaey: التي تطلع على الأفئدة
Saheeh International Translation: Which mounts directed at the hearts.

Ayah Text: إِنَّهَا عَلَيۡهِم مُّؤۡصَدَةٞ ٨
aya_text_emlaey: إنها عليهم مؤصدة
Saheeh International Translation: Indeed, Hellfire will be closed down upon them

Ayah Text: فِي عَمَدٖ مُّمَدَّدَةِۭ ٩
aya_text_emlaey: في عمد ممددة
Saheeh International Translation: In extended columns.

Ayah Text: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلۡفِيلِ ١
aya_text_emlaey: ألم تر كيف فعل ربك بأصحاب الفيل
Saheeh International Translation: Have you not considered, [O Muhammad], how your Lord dealt with the companions of the elephant?

Ayah Text: أَلَمۡ يَجۡعَلۡ كَيۡدَهُمۡ فِي تَضۡلِيلٖ ٢
aya_text_emlaey: ألم يجعل كيدهم في تضليل
Saheeh International Translation: Did He not make their plan into misguidance?

Ayah Text: وَأَرۡسَلَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ طَيۡرًا أَبَابِيلَ ٣
aya_text_emlaey: وأرسل عليهم طيرا أبابيل
Saheeh International Translation: And He sent against them birds in flocks,

Ayah Text: تَرۡمِيهِم بِحِجَارَةٖ مِّن سِجِّيلٖ ٤
aya_text_emlaey: ترميهم بحجارة من سجيل
Saheeh International Translation: Striking them with stones of hard clay,

Ayah Text: فَجَعَلَهُمۡ كَعَصۡفٖ مَّأۡكُولِۭ ٥
aya_text_emlaey: فجعلهم كعصف مأكول
Saheeh International Translation: And He made them like eaten straw.

Ayah Text: لِإِيلَٰفِ قُرَيۡشٍ ١
aya_text_emlaey: لإيلاف قريش
Saheeh International Translation: For the accustomed security of the Quraysh -

Ayah Text: إِۦلَٰفِهِمۡ رِحۡلَةَ ٱلشِّتَآءِ وَٱلصَّيۡفِ ٢
aya_text_emlaey: إيلافهم رحلة الشتاء والصيف
Saheeh International Translation: Their accustomed security [in] the caravan of winter and summer -

Ayah Text: فَلۡيَعۡبُدُواْ رَبَّ هَٰذَا ٱلۡبَيۡتِ ٣
aya_text_emlaey: فليعبدوا رب هذا البيت
Saheeh International Translation: Let them worship the Lord of this House,

Ayah Text: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَطۡعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٖ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنۡ خَوۡفِۭ ٤
aya_text_emlaey: الذي أطعمهم من جوع وآمنهم من خوف
Saheeh International Translation: Who has fed them, [saving them] from hunger and made them safe, [saving them] from fear.

Ayah Text: أَرَءَيۡتَ ٱلَّذِي يُكَذِّبُ بِٱلدِّينِ ١
aya_text_emlaey: أرأيت الذي يكذب بالدين
Saheeh International Translation: Have you seen the one who denies the Recompense?

Ayah Text: فَذَٰلِكَ ٱلَّذِي يَدُعُّ ٱلۡيَتِيمَ ٢
aya_text_emlaey: فذلك الذي يدع اليتيم
Saheeh International Translation: For that is the one who drives away the orphan

Ayah Text: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلۡمِسۡكِينِ ٣
aya_text_emlaey: ولا يحض على طعام المسكين
Saheeh International Translation: And does not encourage the feeding of the poor.

Ayah Text: فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلۡمُصَلِّينَ ٤
aya_text_emlaey: فويل للمصلين
Saheeh International Translation: So woe to those who pray

Ayah Text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَن صَلَاتِهِمۡ سَاهُونَ ٥
aya_text_emlaey: الذين هم عن صلاتهم ساهون
Saheeh International Translation: [But] who are heedless of their prayer -

Ayah Text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ يُرَآءُونَ ٦
aya_text_emlaey: الذين هم يراءون
Saheeh International Translation: Those who make show [of their deeds]

Ayah Text: وَيَمۡنَعُونَ ٱلۡمَاعُونَ ٧
aya_text_emlaey: ويمنعون الماعون
Saheeh International Translation: And withhold [simple] assistance.

Ayah Text: إِنَّآ أَعۡطَيۡنَٰكَ ٱلۡكَوۡثَرَ ١
aya_text_emlaey: إنا أعطيناك الكوثر
Saheeh International Translation: Indeed, We have granted you, [O Muhammad], al-Kawthar.

Ayah Text: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَٱنۡحَرۡ ٢
aya_text_emlaey: فصل لربك وانحر
Saheeh International Translation: So pray to your Lord and sacrifice [to Him alone].

Ayah Text: إِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ ٱلۡأَبۡتَرُ ٣
aya_text_emlaey: إن شانئك هو الأبتر
Saheeh International Translation: Indeed, your enemy is the one cut off.

Ayah Text: قُلۡ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ ١
aya_text_emlaey: قل ياأيها الكافرون
Saheeh International Translation: Say, "O disbelievers,

Ayah Text: لَآ أَعۡبُدُ مَا تَعۡبُدُونَ ٢
aya_text_emlaey: لا أعبد ما تعبدون
Saheeh International Translation: I do not worship what you worship.

Ayah Text: وَلَآ أَنتُمۡ عَٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعۡبُدُ ٣
aya_text_emlaey: ولا أنتم عابدون ما أعبد
Saheeh International Translation: Nor are you worshippers of what I worship.

Ayah Text: وَلَآ أَنَا۠ عَابِدٞ مَّا عَبَدتُّمۡ ٤
aya_text_emlaey: ولا أنا عابد ما عبدتم
Saheeh International Translation: Nor will I be a worshipper of what you worship.

Ayah Text: وَلَآ أَنتُمۡ عَٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعۡبُدُ ٥
aya_text_emlaey: ولا أنتم عابدون ما أعبد
Saheeh International Translation: Nor will you be worshippers of what I worship.

Ayah Text: لَكُمۡ دِينُكُمۡ وَلِيَ دِينِ ٦
aya_text_emlaey: لكم دينكم ولي دين
Saheeh International Translation: For you is your religion, and for me is my religion."

Ayah Text: إِذَا جَآءَ نَصۡرُ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡفَتۡحُ ١
aya_text_emlaey: إذا جاء نصر الله والفتح
Saheeh International Translation: When the victory of Allah has come and the conquest,

Ayah Text: وَرَأَيۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدۡخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجٗا ٢
aya_text_emlaey: ورأيت الناس يدخلون في دين الله أفواجا
Saheeh International Translation: And you see the people entering into the religion of Allah in multitudes,

Ayah Text: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابَۢا ٣
aya_text_emlaey: فسبح بحمد ربك واستغفره إنه كان توابا
Saheeh International Translation: Then exalt [Him] with praise of your Lord and ask forgiveness of Him. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of repentance.

Ayah Text: تَبَّتۡ يَدَآ أَبِي لَهَبٖ وَتَبَّ ١
aya_text_emlaey: تبت يدا أبي لهب وتب
Saheeh International Translation: May the hands of Abu Lahab be ruined, and ruined is he.

Ayah Text: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ ٢
aya_text_emlaey: ما أغنى عنه ماله وما كسب
Saheeh International Translation: His wealth will not avail him or that which he gained.

Ayah Text: سَيَصۡلَىٰ نَارٗا ذَاتَ لَهَبٖ ٣
aya_text_emlaey: سيصلى نارا ذات لهب
Saheeh International Translation: He will [enter to] burn in a Fire of [blazing] flame

Ayah Text: وَٱمۡرَأَتُهُۥ حَمَّالَةَ ٱلۡحَطَبِ ٤
aya_text_emlaey: وامرأته حمالة الحطب
Saheeh International Translation: And his wife [as well] - the carrier of firewood.

Ayah Text: فِي جِيدِهَا حَبۡلٞ مِّن مَّسَدِۭ ٥
aya_text_emlaey: في جيدها حبل من مسد
Saheeh International Translation: Around her neck is a rope of [twisted] fiber.

Ayah Text: قُلۡ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٌ ١
aya_text_emlaey: قل هو الله أحد
Saheeh International Translation: Say, "He is Allah, [who is] One,

Ayah Text: ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّمَدُ ٢
aya_text_emlaey: الله الصمد
Saheeh International Translation: Allah, the Eternal Refuge.

Ayah Text: لَمۡ يَلِدۡ وَلَمۡ يُولَدۡ ٣
aya_text_emlaey: لم يلد ولم يولد
Saheeh International Translation: He neither begets nor is born,

Ayah Text: وَلَمۡ يَكُن لَّهُۥ كُفُوًا أَحَدُۢ ٤
aya_text_emlaey: ولم يكن له كفوا أحد
Saheeh International Translation: Nor is there to Him any equivalent."

Ayah Text: قُلۡ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلۡفَلَقِ ١
aya_text_emlaey: قل أعوذ برب الفلق
Saheeh International Translation: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of daybreak

Ayah Text: مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ ٢
aya_text_emlaey: من شر ما خلق
Saheeh International Translation: From the evil of that which He created

Ayah Text: وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ ٣
aya_text_emlaey: ومن شر غاسق إذا وقب
Saheeh International Translation: And from the evil of darkness when it settles

Ayah Text: وَمِن شَرِّ ٱلنَّفَّٰثَٰتِ فِي ٱلۡعُقَدِ ٤
aya_text_emlaey: ومن شر النفاثات في العقد
Saheeh International Translation: And from the evil of the blowers in knots

Ayah Text: وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ ٥
aya_text_emlaey: ومن شر حاسد إذا حسد
Saheeh International Translation: And from the evil of an envier when he envies."

Ayah Text: قُلۡ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلنَّاسِ ١
aya_text_emlaey: قل أعوذ برب الناس
Saheeh International Translation: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind,

Ayah Text: مَلِكِ ٱلنَّاسِ ٢
aya_text_emlaey: ملك الناس
Saheeh International Translation: The Sovereign of mankind.

Ayah Text: إِلَٰهِ ٱلنَّاسِ ٣
aya_text_emlaey: إله الناس
Saheeh International Translation: The God of mankind,

Ayah Text: مِن شَرِّ ٱلۡوَسۡوَاسِ ٱلۡخَنَّاسِ ٤
aya_text_emlaey: من شر الوسواس الخناس
Saheeh International Translation: From the evil of the retreating whisperer -

Ayah Text: ٱلَّذِي يُوَسۡوِسُ فِي صُدُورِ ٱلنَّاسِ ٥
aya_text_emlaey: الذي يوسوس في صدور الناس
Saheeh International Translation: Who whispers [evil] into the breasts of mankind -

Ayah Text: مِنَ ٱلۡجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ ٦
aya_text_emlaey: من الجنة والناس
Saheeh International Translation: From among the jinn and mankind."
